blocks.text:
These changes will make your header responsive with the following features:

1. A hamburger menu button appears on mobile screens (below md breakpoint)
2. The desktop menu is hidden on mobile screens and shown on larger screens
3. The mobile menu slides down when the hamburger is clicked
4. The menu items in mobile view are stacked vertically with more padding
5. Clicking a link in mobile view automatically closes the menu

The menu will now be much more user-friendly on mobile devices while maintaining its desktop functionality.
